item.title: Malik Nabers: Surgery set for upcoming week
item.description:
Nabers is scheduled to undergo surgery later this upcoming week to repair the torn ACL and meniscus in his right knee, Ian Rapoport of NFL Network reports.
Visit RotoWire.com for more analysis on this update.

item.title: Jayden Daniels: Testing hamstring Sunday
item.description:
Daniels will test his injured hamstring in workouts on Sunday, and the Commanders think he has a chance to return in Week 9 against the Seahawks, Jay Glazer reported on Fox NFL Sunday.
Visit RotoWire.com for more analysis on this update.

item.title: Kirk Cousins: Starting in place of Penix
item.description:
Cousins will start Sunday's game against the Dolphins with Michael Penix (knee) inactive, Tori McElhaney of the Falcons' official site reports.
Visit RotoWire.com for more analysis on this update.

item.title: Bryce Young: Inactive Sunday
item.description:
Young (ankle) is listed as inactive Sunday against the Bills, Darin Gantt of the Panthers' official site reports.
Visit RotoWire.com for more analysis on this update.

item.title: D'Andre Swift: Active in Week 8
item.description:
Swift (groin) is listed as active Sunday at Baltimore.
Visit RotoWire.com for more analysis on this update.
